hero.description: I lead engineering teams and drive growth through rapid experimentation. Combining technical expertise with data-driven product thinking to deliver measurable business impact.

about.title: About Me
about.description: My journey from a hands-on fullstack developer to an engineering manager has been driven by a passion for building not just great software, but great software teams. I thrive on the challenge of scaling B2B SaaS platforms, connecting technology with business outcomes, and fostering a culture of continuous learning. Balancing technical depth with a product-focused mindset to lead teams that deliver impactful solutions.

productLedGrowth.title: Product-Led Growth
productLedGrowth.description: Driving user acquisition by connecting growth levers like onboarding funnels, activation triggers, and product improvements that naturally attract and retain users.

b2bSaasFrontend.title: B2B SaaS & Frontend
b2bSaasFrontend.description: Building robust frontend architectures, have extensive experience in the technical and product challenges of delivering high-quality B2B SaaS software.

experimentationData.title: Experimentation & Data
experimentationData.description: Utilizing A/B testing and feature experiments to make data-informed decisions. Comfortable with setting up experiments, analyzing key metrics, and optimizing user experience.

engineeringLeadership.title: Engineering Leadership
engineeringLeadership.description: Building effective engineering teams, fostering technical excellence, and aligning technical initiatives with product and company strategy.

b2bSaas.title: B2B SaaS Platforms
b2bSaas.description: Deep experience in building and scaling business-to-business SaaS products.

engineeringManagement.title: Engineering Management
engineeringManagement.description: Building high-performing teams, managing technical priorities, and developing technical talent.

scalingFrontend.title: Scaling Frontend Systems
scalingFrontend.description: Building modern, high-quality UIs (not just) for growth.

crossFunctional.title: Cross-functional Collaboration
crossFunctional.description: Working with product, design, and data teams to ship features that drive results.

career.title: Career Journey
career.ceskaTv: Česká televize, Software Development Academy, Showmax

engineeringManager.description: Managing a distributed team of 8 brilliant engineers, focused on Growth engineering and rapid experimentation. Working closely with product managers, designers, engineering managers and stakeholders, while striving to be an enabler for the engineering team.

leadEngineer.description: Tech lead in a small team focused on rapid experimentation around new customer journey. Worked closely with product manager, designer, UX researcher and data analyst. The work involved the whole product lifecycle, from early discovery phase through proof of concepts to putting together teams for final delivery.

seniorDev.description: Part of multiple product teams (initially Leads, later Support Inbox and finally Email & Messaging) while being involved in several platform initiatives. Led several projects within the Missions & Tribes framework. Technologies: TypeScript, React, GraphQL (Relay), Tanstack Query, Nest.js, Fastify, MySQL, Kafka, CouchDB.

frontendLecturer.description: Built a brand new video-on-demand platform at Česká televize (Czech national broadcasting television) from the ground up, including custom video player and GraphQL server. Taught JavaScript fundamentals at Software Development Academy. Previously worked on Showmax's VOD platform. Technologies: TypeScript, React, GraphQL (Apollo).

phpJs.description: Started as a PHP backend developer and transitioned to JavaScript and frontend development. Led the JavaScript team from March 2018, focusing on JavaScript in both web and mobile applications.

frontkon.title: Frontkon 2024: How we said goodbye to GraphQL

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing engineering management, product-led growth ideas, consulting, or technical ideas, or collaborating on growth. Get in touch, I'd love to hear your thoughts and opportunities.
